description.para1: I’m Roshan Shrestha, a full stack developer passionate about creating helpful web apps like Study Buddy. 💻✨
description.para2: With 4 years’ experience in web development and design, I’m focused on AI/ML, coding, and guiding others to start their tech careers. 🤖🐍🚀
description.para3: These days, I spend my time designing, learning AI/ML with Python, and coding. I also enjoy helping others launch their tech careers by building their own web apps. 🤖🐍🚀
description.para4: Outside work, I love playing guitar, gaming, and spending time with my dogs. 🎸🎮🐶
